text: Ra āphnō dharmakā anuyāyīharū bāhēka aru kasaikō viśvāsa nagarnu. Hē paigambara! Bhanidinus ki pathapradarśana ta niḥsandēha allāhakō pathapradarśana nai hō. Tinīharū yō pani bhandachan ki yasamā pani viśvāsa nagarnu ki juna kurō timīlā'ī pradāna gari'ēkō hō, tyastō aru kasailā'ī pradāna garincha. Vā tinīharūlē timīsam̐ga allāhakō agāḍi jhagaḍā garnēchan. Yō pani bhanidinus! Ki bujurgi (anugraha) ta allāhakō hātamā cha. Usalē jasalā'ī cāhancha, pradāna gardacha ra allāha sarvavyāpī (ra) sarvajña cha
